description: Describes the foundations of all NMOS resources
title: Base resource

id.description: Globally unique identifier for the resource

version.description: String formatted TAI timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating precisely when an attribute of the resource last changed

label.description: Freeform string label for the resource

tags.description: Key value set of freeform string tags to aid in filtering resources. Values should be represented as an array of strings. Can be empty.
